figures.title: Nucleotide Diversity by Category
figures.description: Pairwise violin-and-line plot comparing direct and inverted haplotypes across single-event and recurrent inversions.

figures.title: Hudson FST by Recurrence Status
figures.description: Hudson's FST violin plot split by single-event and recurrent inversion groups.

figures.title: Spearman Decay Raincloud
figures.description: Raincloud distribution of Spearman correlations for FST decay near breakpoints, split by single-event versus recurrent inversions with significance highlighted.

figures.title: Population Dosage by Ancestry
figures.description: Mean inversion dosage and allele frequency summaries with 95% confidence intervals across ancestry groups.

figures.title: Mean π Overall Violins (40 kb)
figures.description: Overall violin-and-line comparison of mean nucleotide diversity across inversion categories using 40 kb windows.

figures.title: Median π vs. Distance to Breakpoints (100 kb)
figures.description: Median per-site nucleotide diversity as a function of distance from inversion breakpoints (100 kb window).

figures.title: Hudson FST (Pooled Ratio) vs. Distance (100 kb)
figures.description: Hudson's FST pooled ratio-of-sums trend relative to inversion breakpoints (100 kb window).

figures.title: Mean π: Flanks vs. Middle (10 kb flanks / 20 kb middle)
figures.description: Two-violin comparison of mean nucleotide diversity between flanking and middle windows with paired connections.

figures.title: Mean π by Category: Flanks vs. Middle
figures.description: Four-panel flank versus middle comparison stratified by recurrence status and orientation.

figures.title: Inversion Allele Frequency Trajectories
figures.description: Four-panel allele frequency trajectories combining empirical points and selection-model fits across representative inversions.

figures.title: Callset vs. Imputed Allele Frequencies
figures.description: Scatterplot comparing Porubsky et al. 2022 callset allele frequencies against All of Us imputed estimates across consensus inversions.

figures.title: Callset vs. Imputed Allele Frequencies with CI
figures.description: Scatterplot overlaying 95% confidence intervals for Porubsky callset and All of Us imputed allele frequencies.

figures.title: Inversion Imputation Performance
figures.description: Bar plot of inversion imputation correlations (r) for consensus single-event and recurrent inversions.

figures.title: FRF Edge vs. Middle Half-Violins
figures.description: Half-violin comparison of FRF means for edge versus middle windows with paired inversion connections and box plots.

figures.title: FRF Volcano Plot
figures.description: Volcano plot of centered FRF delta with point sizes scaled by within-category weight and colors separating single-event versus recurrent inversions.

figures.title: FRF Breakpoint Enrichment by Status
figures.description: Precision-weighted strip-plus-box plot of frf_delta_centered values split by single-event and recurrent inversions with weighted medians and p-value annotation.

figures.title: CDS Conservation by Haplotype Category
figures.description: Distribution of CDS conservation levels across inverted/direct and recurrent/single-event categories.

figures.title: CDS Conservation Volcano
figures.description: Volcano plot of differential CDS conservation between inverted and direct haplotypes, coloured by inversion recurrence.

figures.title: MAPT Coding Sequence Polymorphism
figures.description: MAPT CDS alignment highlighting fixed and polymorphic sites for direct versus inverted haplotypes.

figures.title: PheWAS Forest of Significant Associations
figures.description: Forest plot summarising significant inversion–phenotype associations with odds ratios and confidence intervals.

figures.title: PheWAS Forest — chr17:45,585,159-46,292,045 Only
figures.description: Forest plot showing only associations for the chr17:45,585,159-46,292,045 inversion.

figures.title: PheWAS Forest — Excluding chr17:45,585,159-46,292,045
figures.description: Forest plot of all significant associations except chr17:45,585,159-46,292,045.

figures.title: PheWAS Volcano (Full Scale)
figures.description: Volcano plot showing all odds ratios across 1,096 phecodes with full x-axis scale.

figures.title: PheWAS Volcano (Ranged Scale)
figures.description: Volcano plot of odds ratios across 1,096 phecodes focused on OR 0.5-2.0 range with inset showing full scale.

figures.title: PheWAS Category Summary Heatmap
figures.description: Category grid showing disease systems, inversion loci, GBJ enrichment, and GLS directionality.

figures.title: PGS Control Volcano Plot
figures.description: Volcano plot showing effect of polygenic score adjustment on chr17:45,585,159-46,292,045 associations. Arrows connect unadjusted (red) to adjusted (blue) estimates across phenotypes.

figures.title: QQ Plot — All PheWAS Results
figures.description: Quantile-quantile plot of observed versus expected p-values for all PheWAS associations with genomic inflation factor (λ_GC = 1.324).

figures.title: Chr17 Inversion vs Tag SNP Correlation
figures.description: Correlation of effect sizes (odds ratios) between chr17 inversion and tag SNP for 26 significant phenotypes (r = 0.978, p = 7.76e-18).

figures.title: Family History vs Main PheWAS Forest
figures.description: Forest plot comparing effect sizes for phenotypes in the main PheWAS versus family history data.
